name: Time Stalkers
summary: Welcome to a mysterious world, a world made up of strange lands, hazardous labyrinths and many mysteries. Who created this world? And why? A wandering adventurer by the name of Sword has been summoned to find the answers. From RPG legends 'Climax' comes Time Stalkers, a refreshingly unconventional RPG. Featuring randomly generated dungeons, sub quests and a host of VM mini games.
